name: Ritual Survivor
description:
My first entry in a game jam (Godot Wild Jam #50). Was a very fun project to work on (even though I've never touched Godot, or GDscript before hand).

All code, art, music, soundfx, was made during the game jam by me. (Besides the font)
Wanted to get a lot more done, but here we are at the deadline :)

Probably will keep working on this after the GameJam.

Instructions:
Use WASD or LeftStick to move around.

Survive, and beat the final boss!

(sorry about any bugs/issues currently in the build)
